titleStmt.title: To the honourable the Commons of England assembled in Parliament proposals humbly offered to lay down a method which will totally prevent all robberies upon the highway, raise five hundred thousand pounds per annum to the government, and increase dealings of all kinds ...
titleStmt.author: Beeckman, Daniel.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Beeckman.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
